name: GLAAS
bio:
GLAAS is a San Francisco based DJ/Producer who healvily draws influence from the late 2000’s House music scene. He’s also a co-founder and EVP of A&R at Dirty Not Sorry. 

With multiple releases on labels like Revealed Recordings, CLUBWRKS, In rotation, and zero cool, GLAAS is committed to pursuing the dirtier side of the sonic spectrum. He’s played at some of San Francisco’s most popular nightclubs and will continue to push new sounds to new places near you.
